summary: Implemented seller dashboard loading safeguards and query gating: added delayed loading fallback hook, updated SellerDashboardPage to show error/retry and time-based recovery UI, and adjusted React Query hooks to avoid running before the actor is ready and to reduce refetch triggers.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/modified URL parameter and sessionStorage utility functions (URL/hash param parsing and persistence helpers) unrelated to Seller Dashboard loading fixes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on fixing Seller Dashboard infinite loading/performance/UX; URL param/sessionStorage utilities are not mentioned.
